name: Heavy Lies The Clown
description:
Lead your clown troupe to victory.

Bugs:

- Don't recruit after the Wizard, fight breaks the game. 

- Ignore the 'DEV' button during fights, that is for testing.

Teleport Shader effect By pend00 - https://godotshaders.com/shader/teleport-effect/

Card Engine Plugin By BraindeadBZH - https://github.com/BraindeadBZH/godot_card_engine/
